title: Is AI Responsible for the Alarming Rise in Scam Compliance Rates?
description: In today’s digital world, scams are becoming increasingly sophisticated. This has led to a concerning rise in scam compliance rates, raising the question: Is AI solely responsible for this alarming trend? Is AI the Sole Culprit? The answer is not so simple. But it’s undeniable that the rise of AI technology seems to have taken ... Read more

title: Google policy update greenlights ads for U.S. crypto trusts
description: Google has updated its advertising policy regarding cryptocurrencies and related products. According to the company statement, as of Jan. 29, 2024, Google will allow advertising of digital asset-related investment products, including exchange-traded funds (ETFs). “In January 2024, Google will update…

title: US Government Will Enjoy Robust and Vigorous Oversight Over Binance, According to Former SEC Official
description:
A former high-ranking official of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) says that Binance is now subject to stringent monitoring following its plea agreement with the US government. Last month, the world’s largest crypto exchange agreed to pay over $4 billion in fines and admit that it violated US laws by engaging in money […]
